name: The Comfort Zone
description:
A short visual novel I made for a game jam in the context of an illustration class.

Playtime may range from 10 - 25 minutes.

A  little heads-up: English is not my first language, so the choice of words may seem a bit off at times.

If you find any grammatical mistakes or passages that could be worded better, feel free to tell me! Any other constructive criticism is welcome as well.

Enjoy!

Insta: @madita_malt

Twitter: @MaditaMalt

Youtube: Madikken
